issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
Base UI>Views>Web Views>Webview controls loads blank page after pressing "Reload" twice.

Steps:
1: Enter text to search.Click on a link 
2: Tap on the back button 
3: Tap on the forward button 
4: Tap on the reload button two times.

Note:
This is not a regression. It acures on 2.1.1GA too.

Expected results:
After step 4 web page should be able to reload multiple times.

Actual results:
After hitting "reload" button twice page goes blank.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Base UI > Views > Web Views > after pressing "Reload" button twice page goes blank
fields.environment:
Tested on :
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208201549 
and 2.1.1.GA
Device:
iPad 3 version 5.1.

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
